amendment.description: Regarding a report on global poverty and national security.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3690 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3690 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Cantwell. (consideration: CR S9588-9592; text: CR 3589) Regarding a report on global poverty and national security.
